Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a thin brown-coloured slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393624) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393624)
